recipe.title: Slow Cooker Mashed Potatoes Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 4 lb ; potato, peeled and diced ; (1.8 kg)

steps.step: Place potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, and water in a large slow cooker.
Cover and cook on high for 4 hours.
Remove lid and mash the potatoes with a masher or beaters, mixing in the milk.
Keep the slow cooker on “warm” setting while you serve them!
